title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 60.1 - Purpose and general description
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 60.1 - Purpose and general description

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the application
process to receive funding under the Industrial Infrastructure Development

Program. The purpose of the program is to provide State funding for eligible
industrial infrastructure development projects which are an integral part of an
economic development effort within the State. The appropriation for this
program will be used where there is a demonstrated need for State participation
in the industrial infrastructure development project and where funding from
existing programs is not available or appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
60.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
